post:
SKB Enterprise is a hosting provider based in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. We build and operate all hardware ourselves to deliver our customers the highest performance and reliability for the best price!

**Our VPS hypervisors are equipped with High-Speed AMD Ryzen 9 processors, which combined with fast NVMe SSD storage, give your VPS a huge performance boost!**

**Why Customers Choose Us?**
- In business since 2013
- Resources are assigned Dedicated, so no overselling
- Your VPS runs on high-performance AMD Ryzen 9 servers
- Your VPS is backed by fast NVMe SSD storage
- All hardware is owned by ourselves
- We are RIPE LIR member with our own ASN: 64425
- Support available all day, 365 days per year
- Monthly contracts with no cancellation in advance
- Game/Voice servers, VPN, Streaming, Adult allowed
- Realtime traffic insight, reboot, and reinstallations
- Mount your own ISO
- VNC console access to your VPS


**X1**
- 1 core
- 1 GB RAM
- 30 GB NVMe SSD
- 1 IPv4 (with rDNS)
- Unlimited traffic (Fair Use)
- 100 Mbps uplink (upgradable to 250, 500, 1000 Mbps)
- Instant Delivery after payment
**Only 2,99 EUR per month! (~3,62 USD)** _(normal price 5,98 EUR/month)_
[Click to view plans & order](https://skb-enterprise.com/nvme-vps/ "Click to view plans & order")


**X2**
- 1 core
- 2 GB RAM
- 50 GB NVMe SSD
- 1 IPv4 (with rDNS)
- Unlimited traffic (Fair Use)
- 100 Mbps uplink (upgradable to 250, 500, 1000 Mbps)
- Instant Delivery after payment
**Only 4,99 EUR per month! (~6,04 USD)**  _(normal price 9,98 EUR/month)_
[Click to view plans & order](https://skb-enterprise.com/nvme-vps/ "Click to view plans & order")

For all our other bigger plans, check our [VPS page](https://skb-enterprise.com/nvme-vps/ "VPS page"). You can also configure a VPS with custom specifications! See: https://clients.skb-enterprise.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=117

Additional discount _(save up to 15%!!)_:
Payment per 3 months: 5%
Payment per 6 months: 10%
Payment per 12 months: 15%

Typical hypervisor internals:

- AMD Ryzen 9 3900X/3950X processor
- 128 GB DDR4 RAM
- NVMe SSD in RAID 10
- 10 Gbps uplinks

Datacenter Location: Amsterdam, The Netherlands
Network: 64425
Virtualization Type: KVM

**Payment methods**
- PayPal
- Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum)
- CreditCard
- Alipay
- Wechatpay
- Sofort
- Bancontact
- iDeal
For PayPal, CreditCard fees are calculated

**Company details**
Legal name: SKB Enterprise B.V.
Address: Kingsfordweg 151, 1043 GR, Amsterdam, NL
Sales: sales@skb-enterprise.com
Chamber of Commerce NL #: 69737770
VAT: NL857990822B01
